name: Dungeons
summary: Dungeons follows the misadventures of the foremost of all Dungeon Lords, who spends his time luring heroes into his labyrinthine creations with the promise of treasure and a good fight--only to be trapped by his ingenious devices. Once they are in his grasp, our Dungeon Lord must look after and cherish his new prisoners until they are more comfortable with their surroundings because come the "harvest," happy heroes have more precious soul energy for you to gleefully extract via twisted torture chambers.

esrb.synopsis: This is a role-playing game in which players assume the role of an evil Dungeon Lord who must work his way up the underworld hierarchy to regain his throne. From a top-down perspective, players navigate through maze-like labyrinths and use swords to stab and kill various creatures (e.g., skeletons, blob monsters); human-like invaders (i.e., 'heroes') can also be lured into the dungeons for the purpose of harvesting their 'soul energy.' As players engage in frenetic hack-and-slash combat, injured heroes cry out in pain and emit large splashes of blood that stain the ground and surrounding walls. Some dungeon environments also contain large pools of blood.

pegi.synopsis:
The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 12 years and over only.
It contains: Non realistic looking violence towards human characters - Mild bad language.
